item.title: Book Club: Integration tests are a scam (J.B. Rainsberger)
item.description: In our latest book club we discussed J.B. Rainsberger’s presentation from Agile 2009 titled ‘Integration tests are a scam’. These are some of my thoughts and our discussion of the video: I’m intrigued as to how repositories and factories would fit into this picture as I’m not sure whether they count as services, entities or value types. I’ve worked on code bases where we’ve created interfaces for them but I don’t know if that means they would be services or that we did something wrong.
